metadata.title: CVE-2023-2939 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient data validation in Installer in Google Chrome on Windows priorto 114.0.5735.90 allowed a local attacker to perform privilege escalationvia crafted symbolic link. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
